about_the_game: Join Blithe and Aphonic on the continuation of this epic adventure through time. Here we find the duo travelling through time, meeting a host of unique characters.
detailed_description: Join Blithe and Aphonic on the continuation of this epic adventure through time. Here we find the duo travelling through time, meeting a host of unique characters.
legal_notice: All characters design, art and music copyright Deceptive Games Ltd. 2016

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Leopard 10.7
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% CoreAudio compatible card or onboard sound
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX Mountain Lion (10.8)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card or onboard graphics compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% CoreAudio compatible card or onboard sound
